comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anhut_Motor_Car_Company en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Nicholson_Anhut Admits Thaw Retained Him, but in Affairs Other Than Fight for Freedom. John N. Anhut, mentioned by Dr. John R. Russell in the Thaw bribery attempt case, spent yesterday afternoon with friends in the Union League and Lotos Clubs. He was interviewed last night in the Grand Central Station by a Times reporter. He denied emphatically that he was concerned in any attempt to procure the release of Harry K. Thaw from Matteawan. Source: New York Times; February 24, 1913 Link: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9F0DE5D6163FE633A....
